name: get_the_next_dividend_payout_date
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sundayfinance.
Tool description: - PAYOUT DATE IS FIXED-

Feed it a ticker and return next payout date or yield  in response.

/payout example: 
https://sundayfinance.p.rapidapi.com/stock/agnc
output:
{"result":["agnc,14.56%"]}

/yield example: 
https://sundayfinance.p.rapidapi.com/yield/aapl
output:
{"result":["aapl,16 Feb 2023 (Thu)"]}

API description: Fetches the next dividend payout date for a given stock ticker using the Sunday Finance API.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol to lookup for the next dividend payout date.
